details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 19005-2:2011 - 6.1.13 Implementation limits - Graphics state nesting
details.description: A conforming file shall not nest q/Q pairs by more than 28 nesting levels.

rule.description: A conforming file shall not nest q/Q pairs by more than 28 nesting levels

error.message: Depth of graphics state nesting of q/Q operators (%1) exceeded 28
